body_html: Any updates? Experiencing the same problem, on Ubuntu 16.04 pytorch 0.2.0, just like described above. Runs OK on OSX (which does not have CUDA) though. Tried compiling pytorch with NO_CUDA flag, yet still does not work.

body: Any updates? Experiencing the same problem, on Ubuntu 16.04 pytorch 0.2.0, just like described above. Runs OK on OSX (which does not have CUDA) though. Tried compiling pytorch with NO_CUDA flag, yet still does not work.
